gui

Class TextIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.TextIO

  • public class TextIO
extends java.lang.Object
    This class enables reading and writing text from/to a file.
    Author:
    MPatashnik

    • Method Summary

      Read text file f and return it as a String.

         java.lang.String s)
                  throws java.io.IOException

      • read

        public static java.lang.String read(java.io.File f)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Read text file f and return it as a String.
        Parameters:
        f - - the File to read
        Returns:
        - a String of the contents of file f, with newlines as necessary.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - if the file reading goes bad.

      • readToArray

        public static java.lang.String[] readToArray(java.io.File f)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Read text file f and return it with one line in each array element.
        Parameters:
        f - - the File to read
        Returns:
        - a String array of the contents of file f, each entry of which is a line
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - if the file reading goes bad.
